channel.title: Restart server quicker
channel.description: is there a way that we can put in our run cmd file so that as soon as it is exited out of it automatically restarts nd u can enable nd disable as soon as u 1st start it up by like pressin e for enable or d for disable or sumthin?

item.title: Restart server quicker
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Doggie Skill:

I dont think that is possible. But if you have like an allstar source or something like that you can use the Restarter. Its usally near the top of your files.

oh welll thnks for responding anyway i was wonderin if u cud put sumthin in cmd text file like if closed open run.bat or sumthin nt sure dont really work with that just serversided stuff

Read full topic
